about_the_game:
Albert’s Journey is a story about a small brave creature who never gives up. His body is fragile but strong in mind he is. One day he gets lost in space and is forced to find a way back home. During the journey, he discovers new strange worlds and new beings who are either friendly or hostile. Albert doesn’t use violence. He is a pacifist but it does not mean he will not protect himself.
This demo contains tree levels from around thirteen planed and it is only the beginning. Final game is the idea that bothers me for about ten years. Four years ago I decide to release my own game, so I started to learn. Two years ago someone join me and everything speed up.
Right now game is made by the the team of two people and we never been so excited to show you the results.
We would like to finish this game, that is why we are releasing this demo to show you our idea.
If you like this demo please consider donation to help us finish this game.
More details on
detailed_description:
Albert’s Journey is a story about a small brave creature who never gives up. His body is fragile but strong in mind he is. One day he gets lost in space and is forced to find a way back home. During the journey, he discovers new strange worlds and new beings who are either friendly or hostile. Albert doesn’t use violence. He is a pacifist but it does not mean he will not protect himself.
This demo contains tree levels from around thirteen planed and it is only the beginning. Final game is the idea that bothers me for about ten years. Four years ago I decide to release my own game, so I started to learn. Two years ago someone join me and everything speed up.
Right now game is made by the the team of two people and we never been so excited to show you the results.
We would like to finish this game, that is why we are releasing this demo to show you our idea.
If you like this demo please consider donation to help us finish this game.

End-User License Agreement (EULA) of Albert's Journey
This End-User License Agreement ("EULA") is a legal agreement between you and Bite My Pixel

This EULA agreement governs your acquisition and use of our Albert's Journey software ("Software") directly from Bite My Pixel or indirectly through a Bite My Pixel authorized reseller or distributor (a "Reseller").

Please read this EULA agreement carefully before completing the installation process and using the Albert's Journey software. It provides a license to use the Albert's Journey software and contains warranty information and liability disclaimers.

If you register for a free trial of the Albert's Journey software, this EULA agreement will also govern that trial. By clicking "accept" or installing and/or using the Albert's Journey software, you are confirming your acceptance of the Software and agreeing to become bound by the terms of this EULA agreement.

If you are entering into this EULA agreement on behalf of a company or other legal entity, you represent that you have the authority to bind such entity and its affiliates to these terms and conditions. If you do not have such authority or if you do not agree with the terms and conditions of this EULA agreement, do not install or use the Software, and you must not accept this EULA agreement.

This EULA agreement shall apply only to the Software supplied by Bite My Pixel herewith regardless of whether other software is referred to or described herein. The terms also apply to any Bite My Pixel updates, supplements, Internet-based services, and support services for the Software, unless other terms accompany those items on delivery. If so, those terms apply. This EULA was created by EULA Template for Albert's Journey.

License Grant
Bite My Pixel hereby grants you a personal, non-transferable, non-exclusive licence to use the Albert's Journey software on your devices in accordance with the terms of this EULA agreement.

You are permitted to load the Albert's Journey software (for example a PC, laptop, mobile or tablet) under your control. You are responsible for ensuring your device meets the minimum requirements of the Albert's Journey software.

You are not permitted to:

Edit, alter, modify, adapt, translate or otherwise change the whole or any part of the Software nor permit the whole or any part of the Software to be combined with or become incorporated in any other software, nor decompile, disassemble or reverse engineer the Software or attempt to do any such things
Reproduce, copy, distribute, resell or otherwise use the Software for any commercial purpose
Allow any third party to use the Software on behalf of or for the benefit of any third party
Use the Software in any way which breaches any applicable local, national or international law
use the Software for any purpose that Bite My Pixel considers is a breach of this EULA agreement
Intellectual Property and Ownership
Bite My Pixel shall at all times retain ownership of the Software as originally downloaded by you and all subsequent downloads of the Software by you. The Software (and the copyright, and other intellectual property rights of whatever nature in the Software, including any modifications made thereto) are and shall remain the property of Bite My Pixel.

Bite My Pixel reserves the right to grant licences to use the Software to third parties.

Termination
This EULA agreement is effective from the date you first use the Software and shall continue until terminated. You may terminate it at any time upon written notice to Bite My Pixel.

It will also terminate immediately if you fail to comply with any term of this EULA agreement. Upon such termination, the licenses granted by this EULA agreement will immediately terminate and you agree to stop all access and use of the Software. The provisions that by their nature continue and survive will survive any termination of this EULA agreement.

Governing Law
This EULA agreement, and any dispute arising out of or in connection with this EULA agreement, shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of pl.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 780 GTX or AMD Radeon Radeon R7 260X series card or higher
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 980 GTX or AMD Radeon Radeon Rx 460 series card or higher
  • Storage: 200 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 980 GTX or AMD Radeon Radeon Rx 460 series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Albert’s Journey is a 2d platformer adventure game with a pixel art look.
